titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to confiscate and vest certain property of the Government of Libya and to authorize the use of that property to provide humanitarian relief to and for the benefit of the people of Libya, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Date of scheduled consideration. SD-538. 10:00 a.m.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
